thread.title: Kuwait decides not to host Golf Cup
thread.title_full: Kuwait decides not to host Golf Cup

author: muscatdaily@apexmedia.co.om (Muscat Daily News)
title: Kuwait decides not to host Golf Cup
text:
Kuwait decides not to host Golf Cup October 20, 2015 
Kuwait, the hosts of the 23rd Gulf Cup football championship, decided to withdraw from hosting it on Monday following a decision taken by the country's cabinet. 
The prestigious tournament, featuring all six GCC countries -Kuwait, Bahrain, UAE, Saudi Arabia, Qatar and Oman - alongwith Yemen and Iraq, was scheduled to held in December 2015. 
However, the decision taken by the Kuwait government has left the tournament in limbo with doubts being cast if it will go ahead as per the schedule. 
The decision was taken on Monday during Kuwait cabinet'sweekly meeting chaired by the country's Prime Minister, H HSheikh Jaber al Sabah.Kuwait football body was recently suspended by the FIFA ongrounds that it was not in line with the FIFA's sports laws.Saudi Arabia hosted the last Gulf Cup where Qatar emergedchampion.
